title: US elections: Joe Biden exit sets stage for Donald Trump v Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris, endorsed by Biden, is likely to be the first Black and Indian-American nominee. She inherits campaign resources with support from Pelosi and Obama. A Trump v Harris 2024 clash is anticipated. At a Michigan rally, Trump called her 'laffin' Kamala', displaying sexism, which MAGA followers enjoyed. Trump is seen as unhinged in Democratic circles.
summary: Kamala Harris, endorsed by Biden, is likely to be the first Black and Indian-American nominee. She inherits campaign resources with support from Pelosi and Obama. A Trump v Harris 2024 clash is anticipated. At a Michigan rally, Trump called her 'laffin' Kamala', displaying sexism, which MAGA followers enjoyed. Trump is seen as unhinged in Democratic circles.

title: US election 2024: Reactions pour in as President Biden ends reelection campaign
content: Biden ends reelection bid. Trump labeled him worst president. Schumer, Newsom, Whitmer praised Biden for reducing drug costs, fixing supply chains. Stefanik called for resignation; Trump Jr. criticized Biden and Harris's liberal stance. Pica highlighted climate efforts. Michigan is crucial for Whitmer’s goals; Harris seen as easier to defeat. Biden will address the nation this week.
summary: Biden ends reelection bid. Trump labeled him worst president. Schumer, Newsom, Whitmer praised Biden for reducing drug costs, fixing supply chains. Stefanik called for resignation; Trump Jr. criticized Biden and Harris's liberal stance. Pica highlighted climate efforts. Michigan is crucial for Whitmer’s goals; Harris seen as easier to defeat. Biden will address the nation this week.

content: The recently held Republican National Convention saw Trump downplaying false claims that the 2020 election was stolen from him. However, during his return to the campaign trail on Sunday night, Trump did not hold back.

Oil-tainted lake a symptom, and symbol, of Venezuela's collapse
content: A putrid smell hangs over the black-stained shores of Lake Maracaibo in Venezuela, where an oil slick is emblematic of the steep decline in the country's once-enviable petroleum industry. - 'The lake is lost' - A few oil pumps still operate on Lake Maracaibo's polluted shore, but dozens of machines stand idle.
summary: A putrid smell hangs over the black-stained shores of Lake Maracaibo in Venezuela, where an oil slick is emblematic of the steep decline in the country's once-enviable petroleum industry. - 'The lake is lost' - A few oil pumps still operate on Lake Maracaibo's polluted shore, but dozens of machines stand idle.

title: Netanyahu to meet Biden on Tuesday in Washington, says Israel PM's office
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will meet US President Joe Biden in Washington on Tuesday, his office announced Sunday. "Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's meeting with US President Joe Biden will take place on Tuesday at noon," said a statement released by Netanyahu's office, which added that the Israeli leader will fly to the United States on Monday. tw/jsa
summary: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will meet US President Joe Biden in Washington on Tuesday, his office announced Sunday. title: July's Buck Moon will become a Supermoon in August: All you need to know
content: The Buck Moon, also known as the Thunder Moon or Hay Moon, will illuminate the sky this Sunday. This full Moon coincides with the 55th anniversary of the Apollo 11 mission. Don't miss the chance to view this lunar event and other planets in the night sky!
summary: The Buck Moon, also known as the Thunder Moon or Hay Moon, will illuminate the sky this Sunday. This full Moon coincides with the 55th anniversary of the Apollo 11 mission. Don't miss the chance to view this lunar event and other planets in the night sky!
